description: React component source code for a Tic Tac Toe game frontend, including game logic, UI components, and state management.

methods.name: calculateWinner
methods.description: Calculates the winner of the Tic Tac Toe game based on the current board state.

methods.name: Square
methods.description: React component representing a single square on the Tic Tac Toe board.

methods.name: Board
methods.description: React component rendering the 3x3 game board and handling square interactions.

methods.name: Status
methods.description: React component displaying the current game status, winner, or draw.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main React component managing game state, rendering the game layout, and handling user interactions.
